submitDream.pageSubtitle: Share the details of your dream, and our experts will provide an interpretation.
submitDream.tip2: Mention feelings during and after the dream.
submitDream.tip3: Describe prominent people, places, or objects.
submitDream.tip4: If there were specific symbols or colors, note them.
submitDream.tip5: Try to recall the sequence of events.
submitDream.tip6: Any additional details that might seem insignificant can be helpful.
submitDream.tip7: Review your writing for clarity before submitting.
submitDream.privacyDesc: All submissions are confidential. We respect your privacy and ensure your data is protected.
submitDream.formDreamTextPlaceholder: Describe your dream in detail here...
submitDream.formDreamTextErrorOverLimit: You have exceeded the maximum character limit!
submitDream.submissionSuccessMessage: Your dream has been submitted. We will notify you once the interpretation is ready. Interpretation may take around 2 minutes, often faster.
submitDream.submissionErrorMessage: An error occurred while submitting your dream. Please try again.
submitDream.errorInputMessage: Please ensure all required fields are filled correctly and you haven't exceeded character limits.
submitDream.loadingProfileDesc: Just a moment while we get things ready.
submitDream.profileErrorDesc: There was an error trying to load your profile data. Please try again later or contact support.
submitDream.noSubscriptionDesc: Your current subscription is not active. Please check your subscription status or renew.
submitDream.noInterpretationsDesc: You have used all available interpretations in your current plan.
submitDream.noInterpretationsLeftError: You have run out of interpretations.
submitDream.fillAllFieldsError: Please fill in all required fields (*).
submitDream.charLimitExceededError: You have exceeded the character limit.
